I dont know if this has ever been posted before but I think the community should set a certain day of the week as (Overwatch day) and try to overwatch as many cases as possible for like an hour maybe.

When thousands of people come together to solve cases I think a good number of cheaters in the game can be banned faster and help reduce this issue plaguing the game.

Really wicked game.
Although the hilariously inaccurate accuracy of the guns can be rage inducing, it's fun to learn how to control the recoil.
Spent many fun hours playing comp games with the boys.
Definitely a game to get for anyone on Steam that's into FPS games.
